```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(plotly)
files=list.files(path="./parsed/",pattern = ".Rdata$",full.names = TRUE)
loc=data.frame()
for(file in files){
  load(file)
  loc=rbind(loc,loc_gc)
}

plot_ly(
      x =lon ,
      y =lat,
      type = "scattergl",
      mode = "markers",
      color = "blue",
      marker = list(opacity = 0.25, size = 1.5)
)
```
